evidence.claim: Freedom Home Care adheres to HIPAA regulations for patient data protection.
The company participates in electronic data interchange (EDI) facilitating healthcare transaction sets.
Freedom Home Care complies with FHIR standards to ensure interoperability in healthcare.
HL7 protocols are implemented by Freedom Home Care for data sharing between healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of active use of X12 transactions or API automation in their public materials.
